content.headline: Hi {{user.firstname}},
content.copy: This the view from your Volkswagen {{user.vehicle.model_name}}.

content.headline: You're now part of a family
content.copy: Congratulations and welcome to your very own website. I'm excited to start our journey together. I'll send you updates at each point of my journey, whether I'm built, sailing across the sea or at the dealer waiting to meet you.

content.headline: I'm on my way
content.copy:
Good news. The Volkswagen factory is way behind me in the distance.
I'm on a ship and I'll be with you soon.

content.headline: Shipping pathways
content.copy: Volkswagen produces cars in many parts of the world including Europe, South America and South Africa. Vehicles depart these areas for the long trip to Australia before landing in one of four ports: Port Kembla, Melbourne, Brisbane or Freemantle. Cars are then inspected and delivered to dealers to get ready for collection.

children.headline: Keep up to date
children.copy: To access this website at any time, simply select bookmark from your menu browser and add it to your bookmark tab.

content.copy:
Of course, {{user.dealer.dealer_name}} know just about everything there is to know about me
and are always there to help. If you have any questions call them on {{user.dealer.dealer_phone}}.

Or, you can always say hello at
{{user.dealer.dealer_address}}, {{user.dealer.dealer_city}}, {{user.dealer.dealer_postcode}}

The information, pictures, colours, and specifications contained within the Volkswagen Group Australia website are presented as a general guide to the products and accessories offered by Volkswagen Group Australia. Any Innovative Technologies shown are a combination of standard and/or optional extras per model. For further information, please contact your local Volkswagen dealer. Although every effort has been made to ensure that such information is correct and up to date, no warranty is provided that all such information is reliable, complete, accurate or without error. In some cases pictures of overseas models may be shown as a guide. Therefore, Volkswagen Group Australia does not accept liability for damages of any kind resulting from the access or use of this site and its contents.
